name: TheFutureofMoviePosters
0:
”Alexa, open The Future of Movie Posters”
”Alexa, start The Future of Movie Posters”
”Alexa, launch The Future of Movie Posters”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the future of movie posters
des: This skill works with an internal, non-public poster that is printed by Readyland and made available to executives for fun and for promotional considerations. As the user looks at the printed poster they are asked questions and interact with the pictures of the characters & icons on the poster. The narrator is a theatrical-style voice and introduces the user to an owl, a dragon and a gnome pictured.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
